document_data.name: Vinnia
document_data.mainbody: '''Vinnia''' was a Night Blade who resided in the ruined [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Temple of Bhaal]] in the [[Undercity]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Vinnia was a light brown-haired and pale-skinned [[human]] woman armed with a [[crossbow]]. [[Bhaalist]] [[tattoo]]s that decorated her neck and chest were visible from under the [[assassin]]'s garb.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Night Blade Vinnia was among the [[Cultists of Bhaal]] led by [[Cirian]] on a mission of venerating their evil [[deity]] through the slaughtering of innocents in the [[Bloomridge Park]] of the [[Lower City]]. It was unknown if the slaughter was commenced or if the Bhaalists were stopped and slain by the [[Absolute Adversaries]].
